dict.string: If AB ∠ BC, then Collinear(A,B,C).

array.string: For any two angles ∠[l1,l2], ∠[l3,l4]. If l1 = l3 and l2 ‖ l4, then ∠[l1,l2] = ∠[l3,l4].
array.example: For example, in parallelogram ABCD, AD ‖ BC and AC = CA, hence ∠[CAD] = ∠[ACB].

dict.string: if AB ‖ CD and E is the intersection of AC and BD, then EA / EC = EB / ED.
If AB ‖ CD and CD ⊥ EF, then AB ⊥ EF.
If AB ⊥ CD, then ∠[AB,CD] = [1]
In right triangle ACB with ∠C = [1], if E is the midpoint of AB, then E is the circumcenter of (A,B,C) and EA = EB = EC.
If AB ⊥ CD and CD ⊥ EF, then AB ∠ EF.
For four points A,B,C,D, if AC ⊥ BC and AD ⊥ BD, then Cyclic(A,B,C,D).
For a circle c(O,AB) and a point C on Circle c, if Collinear(A,B,O), then AC ⊥ BC and ∠ACB = [1].
If AB is the Diameter of a circle and point C is on the circle, then AC ⊥ BC.
Angle of circumference equals to half of angle of center.
If AB ‖ CD and Cyclic(A,B,C,D), then ∠ABC = ∠DAB.
∠ADB = ∠ACB iff Cyclic(A,B,C,D).
Chord tangent angle.
Line passing the centers of two circles is perpendicular to the common chord of two circles.

array.string: If ∠[l1,l2] = ∠[l3,l4] and l1 ‖ l2, then l3 ‖ l4.

dict.string: If ∠[l1,l2] = ∠[l3,l4] and l1 ‖ l3, then l2 ‖ l4.
If ∠[l1,l2] = ∠[l3,l4] and l1 ⊥ l2, then l3 ⊥ l4.
If ∠[l1,l2] = ∠[l3,l4] and l1 ⊥ l3, then l2 ⊥ l4.
dict.name: Special Angles
Supplementary Angle
Isoceles Triangle

array.name: Isoceles Triangle Theorem
array.string: For a isoceles triangle ABC and a point D on line BC, if any one of following is true, the other two are also true: 1. AD ⊥ BC 2. D is the midpoint of BC 3. ∠BAD = ∠DAC.

array.name: Congruent Triangle
array.string: Triangles are called congruent if they have the same size and shape. That is, corresponding angles have the same measure, and corresponding sides have the same length.

array.name: Angle-Side-Angle Congruence
array.string: Two triangles are congruent if a pair of corresponding angles and the included side are equal.

array.name: Side-Angle-Side Congruence
array.string: Two triangles are congruent if a pair of corresponding sides and the included angle are equal.

array.name: Side-Side-Side Congruence
array.string: Two triangles are congruent if their corresponding sides are equal.

array.name: Similar Triangles
array.string: Two right triangle are congruent if their two corresponding cartesian edges are equal.

array.name: Angle-Side-Angle Similarity
array.string: Similar triangles are triangles that have the same shape but possibly different size. In particular, corresponding angles are congruent, and corresponding sides are in proportion.

array.name: Angle-Angle-Angle Similarity
array.string: If two triangles have two corresponding angles that are congruent, then the triangles are similar. Because the sum of the angles in a triangle must be PI, we really only need to know that two pairs of corresponding angles are congruent to know the triangles are similar.

array.name: Side-Angle-Side Similarity
array.string: If two triangles have two pairs of sides that are proportional and the included angles are congruent, then the triangles are similar.

array.name: Side-Side-Side Similarity
array.string: If two triangles have all three pairs of sides in proportion, the triangles are similar.

dict.string: Ratio by similarity

array.name: Middle Connection Theorem for Triangles
array.string: The line connect the midpoints of two sides of triangle is parallel to the third side of the triangle.

dict.string: The hypotenuse of a right triangle is the diameter of the circumscribed circle of the triangle, and the midpoint of the hypotenuse is the center of the circle. For a right triangle ACB, if AC ⊥ BC and D is the midpoint of AB, then DC = DA = DB, D is the center of circle ABC.

array.name: Equilateral Triangle
array.string: An equilateral triangle is a triangle in which all three sides have equal lengths.

array.name: Pythagorean Theorem
array.string: In any right triangle, the area of the square whose side is the hypotenuse (the side of a right triangle opposite the right angle) is equal to the sum of areas of the squares whose sides are the two legs (i.e. the two sides other than the hypotenuse).

dict.string: The sum of three interior angles of a triangle is [0].

array.name: Definition of Parallelogram
array.string: A parallelogram is a quadrilateral with two sets of opposite parallel sides.

dict.name: Middle Connection Theorem for Trapezoid
dict.string: Use Ratio in Deductive Database Method.

array.name: Ratio by Angle Bisector
array.string: In triangle ABC, if AD is the bisector of angle A, and D is on line BC, then AB/BD = AC/DC.
